- Garbage disposal (black plastic) mounted under kitchen sink; drain connected to white PVC line.
- Dishwasher drain hose (yellow flexible hose) attached to disposal inlet with metal hose clamp; ensure proper high loop or air-gap.
- White PVC drain pipe to wall; no trap or slope visible in this photo (trap should be present and properly connected out of frame).
- No active leaks visible; area appears dry at time of photo.
- Cabinet clutter around disposal (cleaning supplies/containers) may hinder access; keep area clear for service.
- Electrical not visible; verify disposal is on a GFCI-protected outlet per code.
